sentences.en: Creativity is like a journey, we are experiencing sown, burgeon and land on wonderful destination.
sentences.cn: 创意是一场旅行, 我们经历,播种, 萌芽,降落在美好的目的地上.

sentences.en: In the spring, the plants that burgeon are a promise of beauty that is to come.
sentences.cn: 春天, 草木发出嫩芽,这意味着万物吐艳就在眼前.

sentences.en: My confidence began to burgeon later in life.
sentences.cn: 我年纪大些之后，信心才开始增强。

sentences.en: Plants burgeon from every available space.
sentences.cn: 只要有一点空隙，植物就会生根发芽。

sentences.en: Seeds begin to burgeon at the commencement of spring.
sentences.cn: 春天开始时种子开始发芽.

sentences.en: The brain-drain effect of studying abroad has started to burgeon due to flaws in the domestic academic environment.
sentences.cn: 由于国内学术环境恶劣，出国留学造成人才外流的现象已经初显萌芽。

sentences.en: the burgeoning market for digital cameras
sentences.cn: 快速发展的数码相机市场

sentences.en: The seed of friendship and cooperation we sow today will burgeon and harvest in the future and China-US partnership of cooperation will definitely enjoy a better tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我们今天播下的友好合作种子一定能够生根发芽、开花结果，中美合作伙伴关系一定能够迎来更加美好的明天。

sentences.en: When spring is coming all trees begin to burgeon .
sentences.cn: 当春天到来的时候，所有树开始发芽。
